sentence.Network_en: Pyroxene is exclusively diopsidic augite, with a composition relatively colse to the diopside - hedenbergite join.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有辉石是透辉石质普通辉石, 其成分相对近于透辉石 -- 镁铁辉石.

sentence.Network_en: Mineral constituents consist mainly of jadeite, aegirine - augite, magnesio - riebeckite, winchite , magnesio - hornblende, actinolite , quartz, albite, rutile and sphene.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要组成矿物为硬玉 、 霓辉石 、 镁纳闪石、蓝透闪石、镁角闪石、阳起石 、 石英 、 钠长石 、 金红石和榍石.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin augites, denoting a precious stone (probably turquoise), from Greek augitēs, from augē 'lustre'

means.word_mean: 1. dark-green to black glassy mineral of the pyroxene group containing large amounts of aluminum and iron and magnesium
